content: Well lets see if how accurate the dooms day clock is. Give it a few days. I think it should go up a minute. If they do not move it up I am going to raise the BS flag. But they did raise it 2 minutes when NK conducted it's Nuke test in 2007 so that may make up for todays nuclear event. Lets see what they do. "http://www.thebulletin.org/content/doomsday-clock/overview"

content: I like what Yeats poem said... "not with bang but with a whimper"! That is how I think it will ultimately end. Just like any biological experiment...the dominent living entity eventually excrets enough toxin to kill itself. What is exactly what we are doing...
